thread.title: Christopher Lloyd hasn't aged a day since the Back to the Future movies came out over 30 years ago
thread.title_full: Christopher Lloyd hasn't aged a day since the Back to the Future movies came out over 30 years ago

author: Vicki Newman
title: Christopher Lloyd hasn't aged a day since the Back to the Future movies came out over 30 years ago
text:
Christopher Lloyd hasn't aged a day since the Back to the Future movies came out over 30 years ago Great Scott! What is his secret? Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Doc Brown hasn't aged a day since Back to the Future Share this video Get celebs updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
It's been more than 30 years since Back to the Future first hit movie screens. 
It was way back in 1985 when Christopher Lloyd 's Doc Brown turned Marty McFly's life upside down with his time-travelling DeLorean - but Great Scott, you'd never be able to tell by looking at him. 
The famous actor looks like he hasn't aged a single day since then. 
What is his secret? 
The 78-year-old star was spotted on Tuesday sitting down to have a smoke in New York City's Central Park. Read More He was spotted taking a cigarette break in New York (Photo: FameFlynet) Christopher Lloyd starred alongside Michael J Fox in Back to the Future (Photo: Mirrorpix) 
Dressed in jeans and a black jacket, he looked as sprightly as ever - almost as if his younger self has time-travelled from 1985. 
The only real difference is his hair is a lot less wacky now than it was back then. 
Christopher, who is also known for his role as Uncle Fester in The Addams Family, went on three time-travelling adventures alongside Michael J Fox in the popular movie franchise. He hasn't aged a day (Photo: FameFlynet) He still looks exactly the same (Photo: Mirrorpix) Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
